name: stylz
description: Helper functions for writing styles in JS
author: kitze

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run test:single && npm run check-coverage

scripts.precommit: npm run generate-docs && npm run build && npm run test:single && npm run check-coverage && git status && git add .
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.run-docs: rm -rf docs && npm run generate-docs && cd docs/stylz/0.0.0-semantically-released && http-server
scripts.run-coverage: rm -rf coverage && npm run test:single && cd coverage/lcov-report/ && http-server
scripts.publish-docs: npm run generate-docs && surge docs/stylz/0.0.0-semantically-released stylz.surge.sh
scripts.publish-coverage: npm run check-coverage && surge coverage/lcov-report/ stylz-coverage.surge.sh
scripts.update-surge: npm run force-publish-docs && npm run publish-coverage
